preqs: ((FIT9131 or FIT5131 or FIT9017) and (FIT9132 or FIT5132 or FIT9003 or FIT9019)) or equivalentAdvanced programming in Java; Object-oriented software engineering: UML notation, method and SE process; Basic discrete mathematics: sets, relations, functions, graphs; Project management.

rules.ruleString: For COURSE_CODE IN {2402.[5-6], 2411, 2423, 3341.2, 3348.1, 3349} Do true Otherwise (Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5131, FIT9017, FIT9131} and  Must have passed 1 (I/W) units in {FIT5132, FIT9003, FIT9019, FIT9132} with grades other than {STANDARD-DEF, STANDARD-NS})

unitName: System validation and verification, quality and standards
description: This unit covers the core software engineering disciplines concerned with managing and delivering quality software. Topics include processes, tools and techniques for system validation and verification, including major commercial tools used in industry. It shows how to detect, analyse and control defects in complex software systems. Inspection and testing methodologies, analysis of artefacts, robustness, quality assurance, and advanced software validation and verification methods are covered.
